com.aldebaran.qi.helper.proxies

Class ALAudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aldebaran.qi.helper.ALProxy
      • com.aldebaran.qi.helper.proxies.ALAudioPlayer

  • public class ALAudioPlayer
extends ALProxy
    This module allows to play wav and mp3 files on NAO
    See Also:
    NAOqi APIs for ALAudioPlayer

      • playFile

        public void playFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                     java.lang.Float volume,
                     java.lang.Float pan)
              throws CallError,
                     java.lang.InterruptedException
        Plays a wav or mp3 file, with specific volume and audio balance
        Parameters:
        fileName - Path of the sound file
        volume - volume of the sound file (must be between 0.0 and 1.0)
        pan - audio balance of the sound file (-1.0 : left / 1.0 : right / 0.0 : centered)
        Throws:
        CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • playSoundSetFile

        public void playSoundSetFile(java.lang.String soundSetName,
                             java.lang.String fileName,
                             java.lang.Float position,
                             java.lang.Float volume,
                             java.lang.Float pan,
                             java.lang.Boolean loop)
                      throws CallError,
                             java.lang.InterruptedException
        Plays a file contained in a given sound set
        Parameters:
        soundSetName - Name of the soundset
        fileName - Name of the file without extension
        position - Position in second where the playing has to begin
        volume - volume of the sound file (must be between 0.0 and 1.0)
        pan - audio balance of the sound file (-1.0 : left / 1.0 : right)
        loop - specify if the file must be played in loop
        Throws:
        CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • playSine

        public void playSine(java.lang.Integer frequence,
                     java.lang.Integer gain,
                     java.lang.Integer pan,
                     java.lang.Float duration)
              throws CallError,
                     java.lang.InterruptedException
        Play a sine wave which specified caracteristics.
        Parameters:
        frequence - Frequence in Hertz
        gain - Volume Gain between 0 and 100
        pan - Stereo Pan set to either {-1,0,+1}
        duration - Duration of the sine wave in seconds
        Throws:
        CallError
        java.lang.InterruptedException
